code: import{SET_HOVERING_TEAM,ON_EDIT_BRACKET_MODE,ADD_LIST_TEAM_SELECTING,DELETE_LIST_SELECTING_TEAM}from"redux-saga/actions";import{ADD_LIST_TEAM_SELECTING_SUCCESS,ADD_LIST_TEAM_SELECTING_FAILED}from"./reducers";export var setHoveringTeam=function setHoveringTeam(data){return{type:SET_HOVERING_TEAM,payload:data};};export var onEditBracketMode=function onEditBracketMode(data){return{type:ON_EDIT_BRACKET_MODE,payload:data};};export var deleteListSelectingTeam=function deleteListSelectingTeam(){return{type:DELETE_LIST_SELECTING_TEAM};};export var addListTeamSelecting=function addListTeamSelecting(data){return{type:ADD_LIST_TEAM_SELECTING,response:{success:ADD_LIST_TEAM_SELECTING_SUCCESS,failed:ADD_LIST_TEAM_SELECTING_FAILED},data:data};};
